price: Kandi rwose (yewe Muhamadi) twaguhaye imirongo (ayat) irindwi (Surat Al Fatihat) isomwa kenshi, tunaguha Qur’an ihambaye.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
